26// Screen width and height.
27
28#define ORIGWIDTH 320 // [crispy]
29#define ORIGHEIGHT 200 // [crispy]
30
31#define MAXWIDTH (ORIGWIDTH << 2) // [crispy]
32#define MAXHEIGHT (ORIGHEIGHT << 1) // [crispy]
33
34extern int SCREENWIDTH;
35extern int SCREENHEIGHT;
36extern int NONWIDEWIDTH; // [crispy] non-widescreen SCREENWIDTH
37extern int WIDESCREENDELTA; // [crispy] horizontal widescreen offset
38void I_GetScreenDimensions(void); // [crispy] re-calculate WIDESCREENDELTA
39void I_ToggleVsync(void); // [crispy] calls native SDL vsync toggle
40
41// Screen height used when aspect_ratio_correct=true.
42
43#define ORIGHEIGHT_4_3 240 // [crispy]
44#define MAXHEIGHT_4_3 (ORIGHEIGHT_4_3 << 1) // [crispy]
45
46extern int SCREENHEIGHT_4_3;
